医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明，夫妻共同的饮食习惯会影响孕期体重增加研究表明，孕妇及其伴侣的克制饮食行为与更健康的妊娠期体重增加有关，这表明联合饮食干预的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240314/Shared-eating-habits-of- Couples-impact-pregnancy-weight-gain-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240314/Shared-eating-habits-of- Couples-impact-pregnancy-weight-gain-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8984ad1a-d9aa-4896-9da2-f005f4e5cd7a Thu, 14 Mar 2024 23:21:00 -0400 Shared eating habits of couples impact pregnancy weight gain, study suggests
绘制心脏的细胞蓝图：对心脏结构和疾病修复的新见解研究人员利用先进的 RNA 测序和成像技术揭示了心脏复杂的细胞结构，揭示了心脏细胞的复杂组织及其发育途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240314/Mapping-the-hearts-cellular-blueprint-New-insights-into-cardiac-struct-and-disease-repair.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240314/Mapping-the-hearts-cellular-blueprint-New-insights-into-cardiac-struct-and-disease-repair.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d0c8b322-4a62-41f7-8a75-a1749f8a5706 Thu, 14 Mar 2024 23:01:00 -0400 Mapping the heart's cellular blueprint: New insights into cardiac structure and disease repair
塞拉利昂快速接种 COVID-19 疫苗：密集交付计划的影响塞拉利昂的 COVID-19 疫苗接种计划通过在偏远村庄进行社区动员，极大地提高了疫苗的接种率，展示了一种可扩展、具有成本效益的改善全球疫苗可及性的模式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240314/Rapid-COVID-19-vaccine-uptake-in-Sierra-Leone-Impact-of-intense-delivery-initiative.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240314/Rapid-COVID-19-vaccine-uptake-in-Sierra-Leone-Impact-of-intense-delivery-initiative.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d379725-3f0e-47b8-91d2-c0a70a8941f9 Thu, 14 Mar 2024 22:16:00 -0400 Rapid COVID-19 vaccine uptake in Sierra Leone: Impact of intensive delivery initiative
微流控芯片推进神经退行性疾病研究研究人员回顾了微流控芯片模型在理解神经退行性疾病中的作用，通过创新的芯片实验室技术提供了对疾病机制和药物开发潜力的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240314/Microfluidic-chips-advance-neurodogenic-disease-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240314/Microfluidic-chips-advance-neurodogenic-disease-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b72422d7-5daf-421b-9732-77991bd7cbf4 Thu, 14 Mar 2024 19:58:00 -0400 Microfluidic chips advance neurodegenerative disease research
社会经济地位影响美国不同人群的肠道微生物组使用 FAMiLI 项目数据进行的研究表明，社会经济地位 (SES) 显着影响美国不同人群肠道微生物组的多样性和组成，强调了 SES 在肠道健康和潜在健康差异中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240314/Socioeconomic-status-shapes-the-gut-microbiome-in-diverse-US-population.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240314/Socioeconomic-status-shapes-the-gut-microbiome-in-diverse-US-population.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a38dc7da-022c-48b4-b557-db10664cad49 Thu, 14 Mar 2024 19:27:00 -0400 Socioeconomic status shapes the gut microbiome in diverse U.S. population
COVID-19 大流行之前的焦虑疗法可防止压力增加COVID-19 大流行的开始导致人们前所未有地面临压力，这些压力源于对一种新型致命疾病的恐惧、强烈的不确定性以及由此产生的隔离措施，这反过来又导致许多人的焦虑增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240314/Anxiety-therapy-prior-to-COVID-19-pandemic-shields-against-increased-stress.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240314/Anxiety-therapy-prior-to-COVID-19-pandemic-shields-against-increased-stress.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f1abda1-3698-4028-9222-0d3941c471d0 Thu, 14 Mar 2024 16:01:09 -0400 Anxiety therapy prior to COVID-19 pandemic shields against increased stress
在原子水平上设计的新候选药物可能有助于阻止新出现的 SARS-CoV-2 变种尽管 COVID-19 已经从头条新闻中消失，但 SARS-CoV-2（这场大流行背后的冠状病毒）仍然在世界各地肆虐。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240314/New-drug-candidate-Designed-at-the-atomic-level-could-help-halt-emerging-SARS-CoV-2-variants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240314/New-drug-candidate-Design-at-the-atomic-level-could-help-halt-emerging-SARS-CoV-2-variants.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2cceb318-45e0-408f-b2c1-8689dcd3ca9d Thu, 14 Mar 2024 15:47:18 -0400 New drug candidate designed at the atomic level could help halt emerging SARS-CoV-2 variants
肠道细菌和色氨酸饮食可以对致病性大肠杆菌起到保护作用根据 3 月 13 日发表在《自然》杂志上的一项研究，肠道细菌和富含氨基酸色氨酸的饮食可以对致病性大肠杆菌起到保护作用，大肠杆菌会导致严重的胃部不适、痉挛、发烧、肠道出血和肾衰竭。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240314/Gut-bacteria-and-tryptophan-diet-can-play-a-protective-role-against-pathogenic-E-coli.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240314/Gut-bacteria-and-tryptophan-diet-can-play-a-protective-role-against-pathogenic-E-coli.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aae08bf2-a26c-49f8-999b-565cc8033866 Thu, 14 Mar 2024 15:34:54 -0400 Gut bacteria and tryptophan diet can play a protective role against pathogenic E. coli
与狗共度美好时光可以增强与放松相关的脑电波的力量韩国建国大学的 Onyoo Yoo 及其同事于 2024 年 3 月 13 日在开放获取期刊 PLOS ONE 上发表的一项研究表明，与狗共度美好时光可以减轻压力，并增强与放松和集中注意力相关的脑电波的力量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240314/Quality-time-with-dogs-increases-the-power-of-brain-waves- Associated-with-relaxation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240314/Quality-time-with-dogs-increases-the-power-of-brain-waves- Associated-with-relaxation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5c53e4f-45b5-48bc-9d57-6a2661f33a3a Thu, 14 Mar 2024 15:16:39 -0400 Quality time with dogs increases the power of brain waves associated with relaxation
爆炸造成的脑震荡可能会导致中年退伍军人出现阿尔茨海默病生物标志物根据 2024 年 3 月 13 日医学杂志 Neurology® 在线期刊上发表的一项新研究，因爆炸装置爆炸而遭受脑震荡的中年退伍军人的脊髓液中可能含有与患有阿尔茨海默病的人类似的生物标记物美国神经病学学会的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240314/Concussion-from-explosive-blasts-may-induce-Alzheimers-biomarkers-in-middle-ged-veterans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240314/Concussion-from-explosive-blasts-may-induce-Alzheimers-biomarkers-in-middle-ged-veterans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1347bcb7-054b-4193-b422-c4198ce40123 Thu, 14 Mar 2024 15:00:02 -0400 Concussion from explosive blasts may induce Alzheimer's biomarkers in middle-aged veterans
